column5: Anyone know the price of this thing? They don't advertise the price anywhere.  http://retail.petro-canada.ca/en/formycar/3181.aspx  Figured I'd take a shot here first, since I'm on.  If no one knows, then I'll have to go by a gas station and ask them.
About $150 plus taxes.  Good for 90 days.  I suggest to consider it during the winter months not so much during the summer.
I buy a bunch of prepaid wash tickets periodically to keep at the office for the sales staff. We save about a buck per wash that way but they're good forever. It's a great system.  JF
Yeah it would make more sense in the winter with the road salt.
We have one here in town that offers the full service wash pass for $30.00 per month.  That was is worth $13.00 for a single shot.
I paid $130 for mine. It's great, wash all the work vehicles and personal vehicles with it.
Last thing I'd be doing in the winter is washing my car.  Leave the salt, it's not going to do any harm until it's activated by the water
Thanks for all in the info, guys.  I'll probably pick one up.  We've got two cars at home, so it definitely worth it.
